title: Souryuuden
alternative_title: Legend of the Dragon Kings, Sohryuuden: Legend of the Four Kings, Sohryuden, 創竜伝
description: The four Ryudo brothers hold an ancient secret - they are descended from the dragons. They have the speed, strength and power of their legendary ancestors - and they're getting stronger. But when pushed to the limit, they become the terrifying, uncontrollable dragons of mythology. These powers have attracted the attention of some powerful enemies - shadowy organizations with unlimited resources and weapons who will stop at nothing to control the brothers.
